[File: third_party/move/move-core/types/src/vm_status.rs] [StatusCode: SIGNERS_CONTAIN_DUPLICATES] [Duplicate signer exploitation] Code 28 prevents duplicate signers - can this check be bypassed to make one signer count multiple times in multi-sig scenarios? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-core/types/src/vm_status.rs] [StatusCode: TYPE_MISMATCH] [Type confusion] Code 1020 catches type mismatches - can generic type parameters or type aliases be used to create type confusion that passes verification but causes runtime errors? (High)
